Text:
Thanks for sharing, much appreciated.

On a side note, it's pretty pathetic that there are now 750 seeders and none of you assholes could take 5 seconds and say thanks.
Say thanks to whom?  It was uploaded by Anonymous.
Thanks, I am happy someone is doing this for us non HBO people.  It is appreciated.  I remember when the Bengals were on Hard Knocks and I never got to watch that.  I wish you had been here then!
Why do people even bother uploading in SD? If you have a HDTV bigger than 25 inches, they all look like shit.
@GanjaGuy420 - I've watched all these hard knocks rips on a 42" 1080P tv and they are fine. Some people value their time and bandwidth.
